sequence flows interface -> to : 1
flows interface to -> use : 1
interface to use -> business : 1
to use business -> use : 1
use business use -> complexity : 1
business use complexity -> load : 1
use complexity load -> capacity : 1
complexity load capacity -> productivity : 1
load capacity productivity -> index : 1
capacity productivity index -> adjustment : 1
productivity index adjustment -> complexity : 1
index adjustment complexity -> factor : 1
adjustment complexity factor -> focus : 1
complexity factor focus -> actor : 1
factor focus actor -> modeling : 1
focus actor modeling -> actor : 1
actor modeling actor -> weight : 1
modeling actor weight -> use : 1
actor weight use -> case : 1
weight use case -> points : 1
case points use -> case : 1
points use case -> weight : 1
case weight association -> modeling : 1
weight association modeling -> language : 1
association modeling language -> process : 1
language process waterfall -> case : 1
process waterfall case -> case : 1
waterfall case case -> case : 1
case case case -> interface : 1
case case case -> case : 1
case case case -> use : 1
case case interface -> case : 1
case interface case -> point : 1
interface case point -> case : 1
case point case -> case : 1
point case case -> case : 1
case case use -> use : 1
use use counting -> use : 1
use counting use -> use : 1
counting use use -> case : 1
